name: Heartwell
description:
My main intention was to create a sense of atmosphere while also getting more experience creating assets. I can't say there is anything very innovative in terms of gameplay but I am happy with the results for my first solo jam!

Created for Ludum Dare 46 Jam. Solo project. Intended to enter the compo but ran out of time.

All assets were created from scratch!

Rate here if you'd like: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/heartwell

Tools used:
Unity
Blender 2.8
Substance Painter
Procreate 
GarageBand
Audacity
SFXR
GIMP
